title: 925 Sterling Silver Real Genuine Emerald and Opal Womens Band Ring
features: Sizes 4 to 12 Available including quarter and half sizes
description: A Beautiful Georgian Style Natural Emerald & Opal Ring set with a centre 4.5mm (0.18"), two 3.5mm (0.14") & two 2.5mm (0.10") Opals & Emeralds in an adorable Pure Solid Sterling Silver setting. All the Opals & Emeralds are Natural Gemstones. This is such a delightful ring to wear. The round stones are certainly large enough to be noticed however the design of the ring makes it a very easy and comfortable piece to wear the green Emeralds enhance the colors within the Opals and look Fabulous set against the highly polished White Silver. The ornate Georgian design is a pure delight you will want to take the ring off and show it to your friends so they can fully appreciate the quality of this piece. Completely made from Solid English Sterling Silver Hallmarked by the London Assay Office which confirms the rings authenticity. The Hallmark includes the 925 marking plus the Leopards Head and the Royal Lion. Only High Quality Silver articles will have a Full marking such as this.
